entries.title: Sasha Grey will portray a radio DJ in the Cyberpunk 2077 expansion
entries.description: Grey revealed on Twitter that she will give voice to a DJ named Ash in Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty.

entries.title: What do Post Malone, Junji Ito and Metal Gear's concept artist have in common? They're all coming to Magic the Gathering
entries.description: The Junji Ito and Yoji Shinkawa sets are gorgeous, and the Post Malone collab is honestly pretty fun.

entries.title: Splinter Cell remake director leaves Ubisoft
entries.description: David Grivel said it's time for "a new adventure."

entries.title: Overwatch 2's weekly coin rewards are insultingly low
entries.description: I'd almost rather get nothing at all.

entries.title: Former Hearthstone boss says Marvel Snap is going to be the 'biggest card game of all time'
entries.description: Ben Brode of Second Dinner tells us why simplicity and speed are key to Snap becoming the next big CCG.

entries.title: Elden Ring's soundtrack is being turned into jazz for a live concert
entries.description: A Night in the Lands Between will be led by Grammy-winning saxophonist Kenny Garrett and Japanese trumpeter Takuya Kuroda.

entries.title: Riot Games acquires a Wargaming studio to help with live game development
entries.description: Riot's new Australian operation will support League of Legends, Valorant, and tech development.

entries.title: Is the Mario movie trailer supposed to look like this Diablo 2 cinematic?
entries.description: Much to consider.

entries.title: The RTX 4090 is such a chonker that this company designed a special power adapter for it
entries.description: CableMod's' new right-angle power adapter should help fit a monstrous GPU into your case.

entries.title: Leisure Suit Larry voice actor Jan Rabson has died
entries.description: Rabson was a prolific voice actor who worked in games, movies, and television.

entries.title: A Plague Tale: Requiem review
entries.description: A sequel that gets all its rats in a row.

entries.title: How to solve the first puzzle and open the door in Scorn
entries.description: Solve the cocoon puzzle and open the door.

entries.title: Someone's reverse-engineered Perfect Dark for N64 and made a PC port possible
entries.description: An effort to decompile Perfect Dark has borne fruit, opening the way for mods and ports.

entries.title: Windows 11 appears to be hobbling AMD Ryzen 7000 performance
entries.description: Another reason gamers may want to look lower down AMD's CPU stack.

entries.title: AMD reportedly cutting CPU production for its new Zen 4 chips
entries.description: Suggestion is that low PC demand and "poor reception" for the Zen 4 CPUs is to blame.

entries.title: Where to find Padisarah flowers in Genshin Impact
entries.description: These blossoms are needed to ascend Nilou.

entries.title: Nvidia reportedly compensating partners after RTX 4080 12GB's last-minute cancellation
entries.description: It's goodbye to the RTX 4080 12GB, and hello to whole lotta' hassle for manufacturing partners.

entries.title: Persona 5 Royal review
entries.description: Turn-based RPGs take a knee, here's your new king.

entries.title: We asked a professional miniatures painter to try his hand at Moonbreaker
entries.description: The turn-based tactics game claims to be a true digital miniatures experience—so we asked Squidmar to put it to the test.

entries.title: Crucial P3 Plus 2TB
entries.description: More capacity for less cash. But at what cost?

entries.title: Danganronpa's creator has no plans for a sequel right now, but never say never
entries.description: Kazutaka Kodaka wants to focus on new things right now, but more Danganronpa is a possibility.

entries.title: TF2's voice cast is terrorising America's small towns on a hunt for sandwiches
entries.description: These voice actors are having far too much fun shouting about sandwiches in public.

entries.title: The best builds for Nilou in Genshin Impact
entries.description: Get ready for this Hydro dancer.

entries.title: G4 TV's short-lived revival is disappearing after 11 months
entries.description: At least one former employee found out because of a tweet.

entries.title: Logitech G502 X
entries.description: A lightweight and ergonomically superior addition to the Logitech G502 gaming mouse lineup.

entries.title: Asus Crosshair X670E Hero
entries.description: A premium X670E motherboard that's certainly not for users on a budget.

entries.title: Razer's Kitty Kraken V2 headset is all ears
entries.description: The new headsets come with interchangeable bunny, bear, and cat ears.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 485 answer and hint: Monday, October 17
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Monday's puzzle.

entries.title: Razer's new Edge game streaming handheld will start at $400 USD
entries.description: We'd have to see how the cloud gaming actually works before knowing if it's worth it.

entries.title: Five new Steam games you probably missed (October 17, 2022)
entries.description: Sorting through every new game on Steam so you don't have to.

entries.title: Dark Souls 2 Fans are petitioning for the return of long-forgotten promo weapons
entries.description: Four limited time weapon reskins were added to the game to promote its DLCs, and have been unobtainable ever since.
